channel.title: Shops
channel.description:
Hey,
I know this seems simple and usually I would have fixed it by now as I've gone into it. Unless I am missing the point and it is really much more simple, but I don't know.
I am trying to add a "General store" to my server, I have added the NPC, allowed the shop to open and configured what the shop holds.
So then I left-click the item and it displays how much the item will sell for, it's under-priced but that's easy to fix.
But the problem is trying to sell the item to the store, it doesn't allow you to. (Picture provided below)
http://prntscr.com/6jvk7s
What would be the best way around allowing items to be sold in the store? I'm not bothered about it even appearing in the store as I don't want people to be able to buy the items back.

item.title: Shops
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

What did you set the shops selling/buying to?

This is what I use for my store that buys just about anything:

{ "id":1, "name":"General Store", "shopSellType":1, "shopBuyType":1, "currenyType":"COINS", "shopItems":[] }

You mostly need to be worried about the sell/buy type. The rest is rather useless to you.

Read full topic

item.title: Shops
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Go to the method that handles selling items to shops, and search for that message. Add an exception for that shop id. It’s not difficult

Read full topic
